property.name: pg_hba.contents
property.value: # This file contains Ambari specific pg_hba entries for the Greenplum database. # They are appended to the pg_hba.conf file.
property.description: The Greenplum PG_HBA file. Used to define each user's access to the database system. These values are appended, default PG_HBA values are *not* overwritten! The file must be edited manually to modify those.
